description: Table contains patient entered clinical data review from Welcome Kiosk and MyChart.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_ELG_C_YN
columns.description:
Patient allergies reviewed by the patient. The response to the prompt, "do you have any additional allergies?"


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_ELG_CMT
columns.description: Additional comments, entered in a free text format by the patient in response to the prompt, "Do you have any additional allergies?"

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_ORD_C_YN
columns.description:
Patient medications reviewed by the patient. The response to the prompt, "do you have any additional medications?"


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REVIEW_ELG_C_YN

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_ORD_CMT
columns.description: Additional comments, entered in a free text format, by the patient in response to the prompt, "Do you have any additional medications?"

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_LPL_C_YN
columns.description:
Patient problems reviewed by the patient. The response to the prompt, "do you have any additional problems?"


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_REVIEW_ELG_C_YN

columns.name: PAT_REVIEW_LPL_CMT
columns.description: Additional comments, entered in a freetext format by the patient in response to the prompt, "Do you have any additional problems?"

columns.name: PAT_ALG_RVW_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's response to the "are these allergies correct?" question in Welcome.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient indicated correct


Don't have time


Don't understand


Don't have medications with me


Can't find allergy


Can't find medication


Can't find health issue


Don't know details of allergies


Don't know details of medications


Don't know details of health issues


Exited before allergies were verified


Exited before medications were verified


Exited before health issues were verified

columns.name: PAT_MED_RVW_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's response to the "are these medications correct?" question in Welcome.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_ALG_RVW_INFO_C_NAME

columns.name: PAT_PROB_RVW_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's response to the "are these problems correct?" question in Welcome.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PAT_ALG_RVW_INFO_C_NAME
